sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Link as RouterLink } from 'react-router-dom';
import {
  Box,
  Container,
  Typography,
  Button,
  Grid,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  CardMedia,
  CardActionArea,
  Divider,
  Paper,
  Link,
  Stack,
} from '@mui/material';
import {
  Recycling,
  Home,
  LocalShipping,
  Business,
  Handshake,
  Agriculture,
} from '@mui/icons-material';

import ProductCard from '../components/ProductCard';

// Mock data for featured products
const featuredProducts = [
  {
    id: '1',
    name: 'Rice Husk',
    description: 'High-quality rice husk from Punjab farms. Perfect for biomass energy production and mushroom cultivation.',
    price: 1500,
    quantity: '10000 kg',
    location: 'Ludhiana, Punjab',
    seller: 'Punjab Agro Farms',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1605000797499-95a51c5269ae?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
    category: 'Crop Residue',
    contact: '+91 98765 43210',
    email: 'punjabagro@example.com',
    rating: 4.5,
    reviewCount: 28,
    isVerified: true,
  },
  {
    id: '3',
    name: 'Coconut Shells',
    description: 'Premium coconut shells from Kerala. Great for activated carbon production and handicrafts.',
    price: 2500,
    quantity: '5000 kg',
    location: 'Kochi, Kerala',
    seller: 'Kerala Coconut Products',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1605000797499-95a51c5269ae?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
    category: 'Crop Residue',
    contact: '+91 98765 43212',
    email: 'keralacoco@example.com',
    rating: 4.8,
    reviewCount: 42,
    isVerified: true,
  },
  {
    id: '8',
    name: 'Jute Stalks',
    description: 'Jute stalks from West Bengal. Perfect for paper and fiber production.',
    price: 1600,
    quantity: '18000 kg',
    location: 'Kolkata, West Bengal',
    seller: 'Bengal Jute Products',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1605000797499-95a51c5269ae?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60',
    category: 'Crop Residue',
    contact: '+91 98765 43217',
    email: 'bengaljute@example.com',
    rating: 4.6,
    reviewCount: 33,
    isVerified: true,
  },
];

// Categories for the marketplace
const categories = [
  {
    title: 'Compost',
    icon: <Recycling fontSize="large" color="primary" />,
    description: 'Organic waste transformed into nutrient-rich compost for soil improvement',
    link: '/marketplace?category=compost',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581859814481-bfd944e0a555?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2073&q=80',
  },
  {
    title: 'Biomass',
    icon: <Home fontSize="large" color="primary" />,
    description: 'Crop residues and plant waste for biofuel and energy production',
    link: '/marketplace?category=biomass',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1611284446314-60a58ac0deb9?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80',
  },
  {
    title: 'Animal Feed',
    icon: <Agriculture fontSize="large" color="primary" />,
    description: 'Processed agricultural byproducts suitable for livestock feed',
    link: '/marketplace?category=animal-feed',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1596386447478-d71c8d77fefa?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2071&q=80',
  },
  {
    title: 'Fertilizers',
    icon: <LocalShipping fontSize="large" color="primary" />,
    description: 'Organic and biochar-based fertilizers from agricultural waste',
    link: '/marketplace?category=fertilizer',
    image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1592982538980-55806817ae33?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2069&q=80',
  },
];

const HomePage = () => {
  return (
    <Box>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          backgroundImage: 'linear-gradient(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5), rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)), url(https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500382017468-9049fed747ef?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2832&q=80)',
          backgroundSize: 'cover',
          backgroundPosition: 'center',
          height: { xs: '70vh', md: '80vh' },
          display: 'flex',
          alignItems: 'center',
          color: 'white',
        }}
      >
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box
            sx={{
              maxWidth: { xs: '100%', md: '60%' },
              p: { xs: 3, md: 0 },
            }}
          >
            <Typography
              variant="h2"
              component="h1"
              gutterBottom
              sx={{
                fontWeight: 700,
                fontSize: { xs: '2.5rem', md: '3.5rem' },
                mb: 2,
              }}
            >
              Transform Agricultural Waste into Valuable Resources
            </Typography>
            <Typography
              variant="h5"
              sx={{ mb: 4, fontWeight: 400, opacity: 0.9 }}
            >
              Connect with buyers and sellers in the first dedicated B2B marketplace for agricultural waste products.
            </Typography>
            <Stack
              direction={{ xs: 'column', sm: 'row' }}
              spacing={2}
            >
              <Button
                variant="contained"
                size="large"
                component={RouterLink}
                to="/marketplace"
                sx={{
                  py: 1.5,
                  px: 4,
                  fontWeight: 600,
                  fontSize: '1rem',
                }}
              >
                Explore Marketplace
              </Button>
              <Button
                variant="outlined"
                size="large"
                component={RouterLink}
                to="/register"
                sx={{
                  py: 1.5,
                  px: 4,
                  fontWeight: 600,
                  fontSize: '1rem',
                  color: 'white',
                  borderColor: 'white',
                  '&:hover': {
                    borderColor: 'white',
                    backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
                  },
                }}
              >
                Join Now
              </Button>
            </Stack>
          </Box>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Key Features Section */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 8, bgcolor: 'background.default' }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 6 }}>
            <Typography
              variant="h3"
              component="h2"
              gutterBottom
              sx={{ fontWeight: 700 }}
            >
              Why Choose AgriWaste Market?
            </Typography>
            <Typography
              variant="h6"
              sx={{ color: 'text.secondary', maxWidth: '800px', mx: 'auto' }}
            >
              We're building a sustainable future by connecting agricultural waste producers with businesses that can transform waste into value.
            </Typography>
          </Box>

          <Grid container spacing={4}>
            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
              <Paper
                elevation={0}
                sx={{
                  p: 3,
                  height: '100%',
                  display: 'flex',
                  flexDirection: 'column',
                  alignItems: 'center',
                  textAlign: 'center',
                  borderRadius: 2,
                  bgcolor: 'background.paper',
                }}
              >
                <Recycling
                  sx={{
                    fontSize: 60,
                    color: 'primary.main',
                    mb: 2,
                  }}
                />
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3" gutterBottom sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Reduce Waste
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  Turn agricultural byproducts into profitable resources instead of sending them to landfills.
                </Typography>
              </Paper>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
              <Paper
                elevation={0}
                sx={{
                  p: 3,
                  height: '100%',
                  display: 'flex',
                  flexDirection: 'column',
                  alignItems: 'center',
                  textAlign: 'center',
                  borderRadius: 2,
                  bgcolor: 'background.paper',
                }}
              >
                <Business
                  sx={{
                    fontSize: 60,
                    color: 'primary.main',
                    mb: 2,
                  }}
                />
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3" gutterBottom sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Direct B2B Connections
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  Connect directly with buyers and sellers without intermediaries, increasing your margins.
                </Typography>
              </Paper>
            </Grid>

            <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
              <Paper
                elevation={0}
                sx={{
                  p: 3,
                  height: '100%',
                  display: 'flex',
                  flexDirection: 'column',
                  alignItems: 'center',
                  textAlign: 'center',
                  borderRadius: 2,
                  bgcolor: 'background.paper',
                }}
              >
                <Handshake
                  sx={{
                    fontSize: 60,
                    color: 'primary.main',
                    mb: 2,
                  }}
                />
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3" gutterBottom sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                  Verified Partners
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  Our verification system ensures you're dealing with trustworthy suppliers and buyers.
                </Typography>
              </Paper>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Product Categories */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 8, bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box sx={{ textAlign: 'center', mb: 6 }}>
            <Typography
              variant="h3"
              component="h2"
              gutterBottom
              sx={{ fontWeight: 700 }}
            >
              Explore Waste Categories
            </Typography>
            <Typography
              variant="h6"
              sx={{ color: 'text.secondary', maxWidth: '800px', mx: 'auto' }}
            >
              Discover the wide range of agricultural waste products available on our marketplace
            </Typography>
          </Box>

          <Grid container spacing={3}>
            {categories.map((category, index) => (
              <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3} key={index}>
                <Card
                  sx={{
                    height: '100%',
                    display: 'flex',
                    flexDirection: 'column',
                    '&:hover': {
                      transform: 'translateY(-4px)',
                      boxShadow: '0 8px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',
                    },
                    transition: 'transform 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s',
                  }}
                >
                  <CardActionArea
                    component={RouterLink}
                    to={category.link}
                    sx={{ flexGrow: 1, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }}
                  >
                    <CardMedia
                      component="img"
                      height="140"
                      image={category.image}
                      alt={category.title}
                    />
                    <CardContent sx={{ flexGrow: 1, textAlign: 'center' }}>
                      <Box sx={{ mb: 2 }}>
                        {category.icon}
                      </Box>
                      <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="h3" sx={{ fontWeight: 600 }}>
                        {category.title}
                      </Typography>
                      <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                        {category.description}
                      </Typography>
                    </CardContent>
                  </CardActionArea>
                </Card>
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Featured Products Section */}
      <Box sx={{ py: 8, bgcolor: 'background.default' }}>
        <Container maxWidth="lg">
          <Box
            sx={{
              display: 'flex',
              justifyContent: 'space-between',
              alignItems: 'center',
              mb: 4,
              flexWrap: 'wrap',
            }}
          >
            <Typography
              variant="h3"
              component="h2"
              sx={{ fontWeight: 700 }}
            >
              Featured Products
            </Typography>
            <Button
              variant="outlined"
              component={RouterLink}
              to="/marketplace"
              sx={{ mt: { xs: 2, md: 0 } }}
            >
              View All Products
            </Button>
          </Box>

          <Grid container spacing={3}>
            {featuredProducts.map((product) => (
              <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} key={product.id}>
                <ProductCard {...product} />
              </Grid>
            ))}
          </Grid>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Call to Action */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          py: 8,
          bgcolor: 'primary.main',
          color: 'white',
          textAlign: 'center',
        }}
      >
        <Container maxWidth="md">
          <Typography
            variant="h3"
            component="h2"
            gutterBottom
            sx={{ fontWeight: 700 }}
          >
            Ready to Transform Agricultural Waste?
          </Typography>
          <Typography
            variant="h6"
            sx={{ mb: 4, opacity: 0.9, maxWidth: '700px', mx: 'auto' }}
          >
            Join our marketplace today to buy or sell agricultural waste products and contribute to a more sustainable future.
          </Typography>
          <Box sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
            <Button
              variant="contained"
              size="large"
              component={RouterLink}
              to="/register"
              sx={{
                bgcolor: 'white',
                color: 'primary.main',
                px: 4,
                py: 1.5,
                '&:hover': {
                  bgcolor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)',
                },
                mx: 1,
                mb: { xs: 2, sm: 0 },
                fontWeight: 600,
              }}
            >
              Sign Up Now
            </Button>
            <Button
              variant="outlined"
              size="large"
              component={RouterLink}
              to="/marketplace"
              sx={{
                borderColor: 'white',
                color: 'white',
                px: 4,
                py: 1.5,
                '&:hover': {
                  borderColor: 'white',
                  bgcolor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)',
                },
                mx: 1,
                fontWeight: 600,
              }}
            >
              Browse Marketplace
            </Button>
          </Box>
        </Container>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default HomePage;
